de.pifpafpuf.web.urlparam.UrlParam

  • Packages that use UrlParam 
    Package Description
    de.pifpafpuf.web.urlparam
    read/manage/write URL parameters in a safe way.

    • Uses of UrlParam in de.pifpafpuf.web.urlparam

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> UrlParam<T> ParamManager.add(UrlParam<T> template, String value)
      add the given value with the name specified by the template.
      UrlParam<TYPE> UrlParam.fromFirst(javax.servlet.ServletRequest req)
      creates a new UrlParam from the value returned by req.getParameter.
      UrlParam<TYPE> UrlParam.fromString(String text)
      creates a new UrlParam from the given text.
      UrlParam<TYPE> UrlParam.fromValue(TYPE newValue)
      returns a new url parameter with the given new value.

      calls @{link #getUrl(Set,List)} with empty drop set.
      String ParamManager.getUrlWithOut(UrlParam<?> drop)

      Method parameters in de.pifpafpuf.web.urlparam with type arguments of type UrlParam 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String ParamManager.getUrl(Set<UrlParam<?>> drop, List<UrlParam<?>> add)
      creates a URL from the requestUri specified in the constructor and the stored parameters minus the parameters of the drop list plus the parameters of the add list.
